website_summaries.verdict: This is a very versatile floor/bottle jack for those who want to do more than just change tires. We recommend it for home garages and small auto repair shops.
pros: Compact design fits in most wheel wells
Forked lift arm allows precise jack stand placement

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat. Only complaints its really heavy and a little difficult to lower. If not lined up perfectly and careful you could easily ruin the car. Edit: after a few uses it’s become easier to control the drop. I would advise to jack the car up and down a few or more times with tires on to wear things in.
customer_reviews.author: KenMal78

customer_reviews.title: Powerbuilt UJack 2-Ton Floor Jack
customer_reviews.text: I've been using 1.5-2 ton rated floor jack(s) over the years to lift vehicles I've owned. This 2 ton jack gives me complete confidence, regardless of vehicle weight, to lift with an extra margin of safety & confidence. My current heaviest lift is the front/rear end of a 1993 Dodge B250 van (6400 GVW). I believe the UJack extra wide front wheel(s) spread provides additional safety and stability. The supplied Operating & Maintenance Instruction Manual provides valuable information for operation. A well built jack that will give years of satisfactory service! I bought the jack online through Alltrade on Amazon. Check it out!
customer_reviews.author: Bix,  I bought the Powerbuilt UJack through Alltrade on Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the ease of lining up the jack itself and the jackstands is a little oversold as it does require a good bit of lining up.
customer_reviews.author: vader

customer_reviews.title: Limits to only 13” height for placing stand
customer_reviews.text: Could not raise above 13” because sliding a stand under jack would hit the base frame and not be centered on the cars jacking point. This is dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Ravindra Tayi

customer_reviews.title: low build quality
customer_reviews.text: the jack seemed sturdy at first, but after using it for a few days I will be returning it. The jack gears that connect from the handle to the jack release valve slip out from one another and do not turn smoothly. This causes the jack to lower my car way too fast, creating a potentially dangerous situation. Not only that, the jack is WAY too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby De La Rosa

customer_reviews.title: UJack
customer_reviews.text: Extremely heavy, but it does get the job done. I find it completely stable when doing tire rotations. Love the fact you can use floor jack simultaneously. Makes it easy when you want to lift your vehicle from the designated jack points
customer_reviews.author: Ilya Hardey

customer_reviews.title: Very well built!
customer_reviews.text: Great for low clearance and works great with stands. Worth buying if you need to take both wheels off at the same time and work on them
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, low profile jack
customer_reviews.text: The U jack was very convenient when placing stands. Also it is very stout and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul miller

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This floor jack is very heavy duty and sturdy. It operates as expected, with smooth up and down operation. It functions just as hoped, and seems well made and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Solid Jack!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a jack to work on my cars. I have a few classics. This jack is sturdy, heavy duty and easy to use. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Bad deal!
customer_reviews.text: too many problems going back down. Pep Boys will not help and the warranty is junk!
customer_reviews.author: SEAN SAMUEL

customer_reviews.title: Complete garbage
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Don’t waste your money! Jack is not even level. Almost dumped my bike using this jack. Called manufacturer and was told to Mickey Mouse it with “shims” to make it work! Amazing is stepping up and giving me a refund, since the manufacturer is welching I on their warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Simple Tech Installs

customer_reviews.title: Worked well after bleeding the hydraulics
customer_reviews.text: I received this jack in a timely manner. Within a couple days I finally took it out of the box and assembled the handle and went to use it. .the jack only went up a few inches. Due to maybe shipping or cold weather the jack needed to be bled and topped off with fluid. After doing that the jack seems to work as it should. Seems very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne L

customer_reviews.title: Does not lower slowly, it's all or nothing.....
customer_reviews.text: I like the jack and used it a few times. Once to remove and install a rear axle assembly on my Dodge pickup. BUT, I have a MAJOR complaint though.... I CANNOT lower it slowly!!!!! Feels VERY DANGEROUS when things just slam down.
customer_reviews.author: Prototype

customer_reviews.title: Worked awesome while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: It was working great I lifted my Brute Force 750 many times with it no problem. It's barely 30 days old and it completely just gave out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived without handle bar bolt!
customer_reviews.text: I am frustrated because the jack came without this important piece. While it can be used, this makes moving it around very dangerous. I called the seller and they took my complaint. I now wait to see what will happen. Until then 2 stars is the most I can give since I am not going to risk using it without this bolt. Will update as soon as they reply to my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Chaplainmolina

customer_reviews.title: This jack is really nice, I lifted a 2017 Chevy Express 1500 rear ...
customer_reviews.text: This jack is really nice, I lifted a 2017 Chevy Express 1500 rear wheel with ease. This jack is will not be suited for everyone as it does not have a low profile so depending on the vehicle you are trying to raise a completely flat tire would prove very difficult if not impossible to raise. Well worth the money, I have already ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: Demon840

customer_reviews.title: Junk Internals -- Only lasted 1 yr
customer_reviews.text: The internals in this thing are junk. Only lasted 1 yr before it got stuck in the "up" position, leaving my F350 Dually just hanging there in the air - no way to get it down. There are also no repair/fix kits for it that I could find anywhere. Probably a lawsuit waiting to happen...
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: No response from seller
customer_reviews.text: I’ve contacted seller twice with no response. Disappointing. This box arrived severely damaged and although the jack appeared to be fine, a key bolt fell out of the box (see photos) that hold the jack handle in place. This rating is based solely on the lack of response from the seller and the fact that I now need to go find a bolt. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi D

customer_reviews.title: Great lift. Stable. Lowers a little bit fast. 8/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my Heritage Classic. This lift is surprisingly heavy duty, strong, and well built. It is a little bit tall, and you have to rock the bike side to side to work it under. It also seems to list gently toward the handle, once it was up. It is very stable, and I am quite happy with it. I have used a few other bike lifts, but this one is the best one, for the price. I really like that it is good for cars, too. Really saves space in the garage. I wonder if it is tall enough for the GMC? 8/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jaminhoover

customer_reviews.title: $180 Of 2 yr old scrap junk
customer_reviews.text: It lasted 2 years and gave out. I only used it to lift a 700lb commercial mower. I thought if i pd that kind of money, it would be my last one. Who .akes these things? Ray charles. No point calling cs after reading the reviews that the do not respond.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lift
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lift... I purchased it pretty exclusively for motor cycles... I've used it on my Harley Bagger, Yamaha Sport Crusier, and Yamaha Dirt Bike... nice lift. Easy to use, moves around the shop floor (uneven wood) with ease, lifts to nice height... maybe 30 inches high or so never measured it, very solid. The Harley is like 900lbs and this lift is solid with the bike on it at max height or resting on the locking pin. Very secure no worries. I highly recommend it at the price. I thought it was bargin.
customer_reviews.author: FoxHillSpeedShop

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately, I haven't experienced any of the issues that ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the jack within the last couple of weeks. Fortunately, I haven't experienced any of the issues that others have with the product (leaking hydraulic fluid, not functioning, ect.) I've used it once to lift my ATV. FYI: Straps should probably be used to take advantage of the holding hooks for safety. And I've used it at least 3 times to perform front suspension/bushing work on my 2000 Expedition. The jack lifted and lowered without any problems. The locking bar added piece of mind that I wouldn't be pinned under vehicle should it fell.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these about 2-3 years ago because I was tired of my old, failing cheap floor jack. I was worried whether or not I would get a good product since, even though this is a more expensive jack, it's still cheap for what it does. In short, I've been nothing but pleased. It's served it's purpose so well that I bought another in order to make oil changes even easier. If you're on the fence, get it. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: UltraB

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: The floor jack is okay however, when it comes to motorcycle lifting the bike is not stable on it you may overcome that by tying down the bike to the lift. You need to be careful where you are going to lift the bike from. Make sure you don't lift from an area can get crush from the weight of the bike. It is a good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: S. Yazicioglu

customer_reviews.title: No it is small. But could be big
customer_reviews.text: I have contacted this company twice about a set screw on the handle. No response screw was missing
customer_reviews.author: Barry Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after 9 months of very light use :(
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this jack for 9 months and is already leaking.It has seen very light use. I've only used it on my own car. It has worked great so far but I'm very disappointed at the leak. This is not a durable jack.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I hope this helps
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this floor jack! I can easily set my jack stand by using the stock jack placements on my Lincoln MKX and my smaller Buick Encore. Only two complains. It is VERY heavy. But it has a sturdy handle. However, I'm docking a star because the lifting gears give it a rough let down. This is a complaint that of this floor jack. The lifting gears appeared somewhat rusted. I applied some oil and it worked better but still not as well and some cheaper jacks. I'm keeping it because the benefits outweigh the cons. I would buy and updated version of this jack.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I dont write many reviews...but this was a jack I hoped would work well enough on my wife's Escape...and it was easy and Ive worked on several SUVs and trucks. The wide pad with the jack point adds stability and the unit is strong and solid. For and even higher priced jack this would still rate a 5/5 in my book. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good jack for money.
customer_reviews.text: Great price great idea for the crossbar that protects from jack failure. It sometimes is difficult to prime and doesn’t quite pump in as great increments as one would like. However it has very solid wide sturdy stand great for utility vehicles and automobiles.
customer_reviews.author: D miller

customer_reviews.title: Good base jack for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good jack. Only issue I have is the gears that tighten to raise or loosen to lower the jack seem to bind up a lot. I had to use pliers to get it to lower as the handle would not break it loose. Once you get it ready to raise or lower, it holds my motorcycle up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great jack
customer_reviews.text: Great jack works as designed. However the rod that is used to hold the jack will bend when you use it on the front end of your vehicle. After replacing the rod I feel much safer.
customer_reviews.author: dean smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for motorcycles and cars
customer_reviews.text: Had to take the wheels off the jack to get under my bike which was no trouble at all. Then turned around and used it on my car for an oil change and tire rotation. Would have been nice if the shipping company hadn't ripped the box and lost the small plate attachment for this to use on cars, but still did the trick. Good quality jack in my book.
customer_reviews.author: ZerØDivision

customer_reviews.title: Jack Leaking oil without using it
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this combi jack a few months ago> when I received it I assemble it and put it in a corner. After few days I saw a liquid on the floor. When I wen to to check what it may be I saw it was oil coming from the jack.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Kramers

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I've already used this on my car and truck! The top adjusts to the angle of the car and has a locking feature. This is the nicest jack I've ever used and now has my mechanic brother jealous! I'll definitely give this a 5 star! Don't miss out!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-function jack
customer_reviews.text: I really like how high it lifts. I dislike that it's kind of heavy. I use it every day for lifting atvs, side-by-sides, snowmobiles and motorcycles. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: kailey moore

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service,
customer_reviews.text: Used one time and jack quit working and Pep Boys say it has past the 90 days and refuse to help
customer_reviews.author: al love

customer_reviews.title: Size! Size! Weight!
customer_reviews.text: The jack is more than expected! Thank You! This is going to provide a quality tool that gives the impression of a professional model that a garage nut can afford!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great jack, but had to return it because it wouldn’t go low enough to get under my V-Rod. Looks like it would work exceptionally well for a bike with a normal ride height.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Bredlow

customer_reviews.title: Too tall
customer_reviews.text: Too tall for my bike. 2016 Harley Street Glide Special. I had to drive bike up onto a piece of wood to get enough clearance for the jack to go under. Decent quality. Package was damaged in shipping but inside was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D. Craft

customer_reviews.title: Really well built.
customer_reviews.text: I used this jack to move a 1200 lbs crate. It worked great. The life is strong well built and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: KTO 2.0

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband chose this lift jack and placed it on a wish list. He loves it! He can now work on his motorcycle and truck with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Evee Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Use it for what it's build for.
customer_reviews.text: I pick up one side of the car at once, makes it easier to change from snow tires back to all season.
customer_reviews.author: joelwsteiger

customer_reviews.title: So good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I luckily did not have any of the issues that others complained of. It went up and came down smooth. It's sturdy. Didn't have to add oil or anything. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Smith

customer_reviews.title: doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy, Doesn't last. will not hold load. only used 3 times, already garbage.
customer_reviews.author: JARED

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as "New"
customer_reviews.text: I've got a pretty good idea this wasn't new. I would have let it go, but the half of the handle that actually allows you to turn the shaft to allow the jack to lower it was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Tall for some bikes.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lift for my Harley but too tall to fit under the bike so it is pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: Map

customer_reviews.title: buy something else
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for about 6 months, now it will not lower. The incredible Hulk himself could not turn this to lower it. It doesn't matter how much weight is loaded on... I'm currently using the handle for a breaker bar. A $100.00+ breaker bar...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile floor jack
customer_reviews.text: Awesome jack! I use it for motorcycles, cars, and most recently to drop an engine and transmission out of a vw bus. The jack is very compact, and the versatility is awesome! Best floor jack I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and secure jack lift at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: So far a great product. Easy to use and operates well. Very sturdy lift for working on my Polaris Sportsman. Best pricing I've seen. Crossbar support below jack lift arms gives good feeling of security.
customer_reviews.author: AZSmoke 101

customer_reviews.title: Good at first poor quality seals didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality seals does not last long only worked for a few months now it is useless
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Good build.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but the rubber matts do come off. but an easy fix is to clean the surfaces and use strong contact cement. I have a 05 Titan, a 97 Mazda 626 and a 74 Karmann Ghia I use it on. It lifts all with ease however its a little tall for the mazda's front end so I have to jack it up from the side. 5.25" is what I measured that the jack can get under and you have to leave room to pump the handle.
customer_reviews.author: The Troy

customer_reviews.title: This is a very sturdy jack and works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy jack and works great. My Sportster 883c needs a tad more room to go under smoothly. If I inflate the rear to 40 lbs it seems to help. Not sorry about the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bear Barkle

customer_reviews.title: Just “ok” with some flaws
customer_reviews.text: The handle mechanism is not built to the sturdiness as the jest of this jack. If you tighten the bolt to secure the handle to the jack, you then cannot turn the handle to release the jack. If you don’t tighten the bolt, the handle comes off. There is no good medium
customer_reviews.author: Brian Holzworth

customer_reviews.title: The extra few inches makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the extra height. It has lots of rubber padding to prevent scratches and gouging. I was able to lower the lower frame and replace the power steering rack with the extra height.
customer_reviews.author: GemAPeel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very handy. I wish it had an option for a lower locking position as well as the all the way up one. Jack has awesome casters, it just glides across the garage floor.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy. It is a bit too tall to slide under my Honda Shadow 750 but I made it work by rolling front tire on a 4” block. I am also able to use it on my trucks so I like that this jack will do both, bikes and auto.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty much as it should.
customer_reviews.text: It works as it should, as expected, except the way it pulls back over itself as it raises. I'd prefer it to lift straight up like my floor jack. I bought it to lift my 4wheeler, as my existing jack will not go far enough under it before hitting the running boards with the lift frame.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: jacks up slow
customer_reviews.text: overall does what is says just jacks up really slow
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Zbella

customer_reviews.title: great multipurpose lift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to move and help set my Larcin 500 lift in place-in the truck rear mount. Just right. I caution to tie down though as it may slip. more later when I find my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Old Timer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Good maneuverability after jacking my bike up
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Good maneuverability after jacking my bike up. Easily move the bike in my garage to be out of the way and better access for servicing the bike also.
customer_reviews.author: Purkinje Jolt

customer_reviews.title: Solid floor jack
customer_reviews.text: One of the nicest floor jacks I ever owned. Super solid and works well. Comes with a safety bar which is a nice feauture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Though it is very steady and strong, it was missing the screw that holds the handle on when I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: VictoryRider

customer_reviews.title: Locking pin for handle does not line up
customer_reviews.text: The locking pin for the handle will not go all the way in due to the handle not fitting correctly. This causes the handle to not be useful to roll the jack around with. Other than that nice jack.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jack. Strong, well made and is the best so far.
customer_reviews.author: Canadianchic72

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this jack! Picks up my 94 suburban no problem box came in a jacked off but didn't hurt the jack.
customer_reviews.author: bryan zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: awesome purchase with great price
customer_reviews.text: best jack ever !!!! its made of super high quality by my standards anyways
customer_reviews.author: pau;buyon

customer_reviews.title: Great multi function jack
customer_reviews.text: This jack is great for low vehicles, lawn mowers, dirt bike motorcycles. It's got a nice lift height and is stable.
customer_reviews.author: Milo the Cat

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to lift my Valkyrie motorcycle and it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S

customer_reviews.title: 3 stat
customer_reviews.text: Wont fit under my street glide without ramping my front tire. Everything else is ok
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Butler

customer_reviews.title: excellent jack!
customer_reviews.text: This jack was a lot more than I expected! It is very well made and solid...more than enough for a garage! I have used it quite a bit since I got it and it has surpassed all of my expectations. I am very happy with this purchase and strongly recommend it. You'll love this jack!
customer_reviews.author: Gildardo Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Goes high enough to get jack stands pretty tall under it so I can be on a ...
customer_reviews.text: low enough to get under my factory-height 1995 Camaro. Goes high enough to get jack stands pretty tall under it so I can be on a creeper and do the plugs and wires. Looking forward to using it on my Honda Shadow motorcycle. I expect it will work great. Solid build. VERY heavy. Plan to leave it on the ground and wheel it around. Not something you can pick up and carry around your vehicle very easily. Save your strength for wrenching. Glad I bought it. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: theteam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding......metal wheels. Lifts suv effortlessly. Very well made. Fits easily under small passenger cars.
customer_reviews.author: tiger

customer_reviews.title: Too fat to fit under my bike (2000 Yamaha V-Star ...
customer_reviews.text: Too fat to fit under my bike (2000 Yamaha V-Star 1100 and Honda Shadow Phantom). Have to lift up bike to try and use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Watson

customer_reviews.title: Missing Hardware
customer_reviews.text: The Handle lock screw was missing and hole appears to be stripped. I will have to buy a screw and hope the hole is not stripped. Can't pull jack backward because handle pulls out of the jack.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ahern

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice jack. Missing a set screw for the handle. Would have been a 5;star if not for that. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: donnie tinsley

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed more tools, but this one really works. Use it for more than our old jack, sturdy and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Sad customer
customer_reviews.text: This product showed up with the box already tore open and this jack itself has scuff marks all over it:( this is for my father for Christmas and many people were rainting and raving about it so I was disappointed when it showed up like this
customer_reviews.author: christa

customer_reviews.title: Best price anywhere
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it. Strap the road glide to it. Very sturdy. Drive the rear tire up on 2x4 . Jack will fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K Dawg

customer_reviews.title: I really like this Jack it worked great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Jack it worked great. it is slow to rise. But it picked up my truck when I have a ton in it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen H.

customer_reviews.title: Knowing the right tool for the right job
customer_reviews.text: The Jack was exactly as described and is very easy to use and Assemble I'm really glad with the purchase thank you seller.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy winkler

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for just less than 2 years. Worked fine for a year+. Tried it today and no go - it developed a leak.
customer_reviews.author: GCM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great, too heavy to lift around but I don’t have to. Seems good quality. It may release load a little fast at times for some projects
customer_reviews.author: brad_s

customer_reviews.title: Two stars missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Was not very happy with the product it was missing parts but luckily I was able to Flying the parts locally
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does awesome. Will lift my pickup, my Harley, my car and the back end of a 2004 freightliner.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design. Crap pump.
customer_reviews.text: Beware of slow leak. It sags within hours. Luckily this started at the end of my big project but I will be pursuing a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Missing bolt to secure handle but very good product, would reccommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and well constructed. Lifts my Charger with ease, and high enough for me to actually slide under to place the jack stands. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Gary R Peek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pros-low profile, I can use it on ATV and Truck cons-None
customer_reviews.author: Michael Starsky

customer_reviews.title: Beast of a jack.
customer_reviews.text: Solid beast lots of metal to it, no question on its lifting capability, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: sgert

customer_reviews.title: ... a 2006 Honda Foreman 500 but it is not super sturdy unless the ATV is strapped down
customer_reviews.text: Slides under a 2006 Honda Foreman 500 but it is not super sturdy unless the ATV is strapped down.
customer_reviews.author: J. George

customer_reviews.title: This is a MUST BUY for mechanics or anyone needing a great jack for home use.
customer_reviews.text: Use it for my personal vehicle and UTV to do mechanic work. It is an awesome jack for such little money. Easily beats anything out there for sturdiness and price point.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Stull

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for about a month doesn’t stay up and dropped my bike. Don’t like it
customer_reviews.author: JERRY

customer_reviews.title: Great product. If you put an 800 pound bike ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. If you put an 800 pound bike on it and try and move it around it is very wobbly. I will buy this Jack again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: nice heavy piece of equiptment
customer_reviews.text: Does the job securely. I've used it on my Subaru and my Suzuki DRZ.
customer_reviews.author: zenart

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good purchases super steady and give you a good sense of safety ness
customer_reviews.author: J.A

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great! A little heavier of a jack than i would have liked, but for a multi purpose jack it is a good compromise. Very stable when lifting motorcycles on concrete floor. Atvs, lawn mower and the cars in the grass or floor.
customer_reviews.author: Ajb

customer_reviews.title: This is one hell of a JACK! Extremely well ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one hell of a JACK! Extremely well built, heavy with multi tasking abilities! If one is going to use this on hard, smooth surfaces (like concrete), you've got a Winner here!
customer_reviews.author: gumtree

customer_reviews.title: Leaky cylinder
customer_reviews.text: My jack hasn’t lasted a year and I am very unsatisfied with it. The cylinder leaks fluid and now won’t lift any weight at all. This is complete junk would never buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassedy Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this lift. Better than a traditional jack. works super!
customer_reviews.author: Rush Jeep
